name: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
desc: Survive waves of enemies for 10 minutes in this bullet heaven shooter
longDesc: 10 Minutes Till Dawn is a roguelite shooter where you fight increasingly difficult waves of creatures for exactly 10 minutes. Upgrade your character's abilities and weapons as you progress through each run.

name: 2048 Cupcakes
desc: Sweet twist on 2048 with delicious cupcake tiles
longDesc: 2048 Cupcakes is a themed version of the classic 2048 puzzle game. Combine matching cupcakes to create new varieties and reach the ultimate cupcake tile.

desc: 2048 extended to the maximum JavaScript number limit
longDesc: An extreme version of 2048 that continues far beyond the original game's limit. Combine tiles all the way to 9007199254740992, the maximum safe integer in JavaScript.

name: 99 Balls
desc: Break bricks with bouncing balls in this addictive arcade game
longDesc: 99 Balls is a brick breaker game where you aim and shoot balls to destroy numbered blocks. Collect more balls and break all blocks before they reach the bottom.

name: A Small World Cup
desc: Ragdoll physics soccer game with simple one-button controls
longDesc: A Small World Cup is a hilarious physics-based soccer game where you control a ragdoll player using just one button. Time your jumps to kick the ball and score goals in this chaotic world cup tournament.

name: Achievement Unlocked
desc: A game about unlocking achievements as an elephant
longDesc: Achievement Unlocked is a humorous meta-game where the entire point is to unlock achievements. Control an elephant in a small room and discover creative ways to earn all the achievements.

name: Animal Crossing: Wild World
desc: Life simulation game where you build a community with animal villagers
longDesc: Animal Crossing: Wild World is the Nintendo DS classic where you create your own village, interact with animal neighbors, collect items, fish, catch bugs, and live a peaceful life in real-time.

name: Aqua Park.io
desc: Race down water slides and beat other players to the finish
longDesc: Aqua Park.io is a multiplayer racing game where you slide down colorful water park slides, taking shortcuts and avoiding obstacles to reach the pool first.

name: Backrooms 2D
desc: Explore the endless liminal spaces of the Backrooms in 2D
longDesc: Backrooms 2D is a horror exploration game based on the Backrooms creepypasta. Navigate through endless yellow hallways and try to survive the entities lurking in this 2D perspective.

name: Backrooms 3D
desc: First-person horror exploration through the infinite Backrooms
longDesc: Backrooms 3D brings the unsettling Backrooms experience to life in first-person 3D. Navigate the maze-like office spaces while avoiding entities and searching for an escape.

name: Bacon May Die
desc: Action-packed beat 'em up starring a bacon warrior
longDesc: Bacon May Die is a fast-paced fighting game where you play as a piece of bacon battling through waves of enemies. Use weapons, dodge attacks, and survive as long as possible.

name: Bad Ice Cream 2
desc: Multiplayer maze game where ice cream characters collect fruit
longDesc: Bad Ice Cream 2 is the sequel to the popular puzzle game. Control ice cream characters, create and break ice blocks, collect fruits, and avoid enemies in challenging mazes.

name: Bad Ice Cream 3
desc: Third installment of the ice cream maze puzzle series
longDesc: Bad Ice Cream 3 continues the frozen fun with new levels, mechanics, and challenges. Team up or play solo to collect fruit while managing ice blocks and avoiding monsters.

name: Bad Ice Cream
desc: Original maze puzzle game with ice-making mechanics
longDesc: Bad Ice Cream is the original game where you control ice cream characters in challenging mazes. Create ice barriers to block enemies and collect all the fruit to complete each level.

name: Bad Parenting
desc: Horror game about a mysterious doll and family secrets
longDesc: Bad Parenting 1: Mr. Red Face is a psychological horror game that tells the story of a child who receives visits from the mysterious Mr. Red Face, uncovering dark family secrets.

name: Bad Piggies
desc: Build vehicles to help the pigs steal eggs in this Angry Birds spinoff
longDesc: Bad Piggies is a puzzle game from Rovio where you build creative vehicles for the pigs. Use various parts to construct contraptions that can navigate through challenging terrain.

name: Baldi's Basics
desc: Horror education game where you escape from an angry teacher
longDesc: Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning is a horror game disguised as a '90s edutainment title. Collect notebooks while avoiding Baldi and other strange characters in a surreal school.

name: Ball Maze
desc: Guide a ball through intricate 3D mazes to reach the goal
longDesc: Ball Maze is a physics puzzle game where you tilt and navigate a ball through complex 3D mazes. Avoid holes, collect stars, and reach the finish in the shortest time possible.

name: Basket Random
desc: Chaotic basketball game with random physics and rules
longDesc: Basket Random is a hilarious basketball game with constantly changing physics, court layouts, and rules. Adapt to crazy conditions and score more baskets than your opponent.

name: Basketball Legends
desc: Play as legendary basketball players in this arcade sports game
longDesc: Basketball Legends lets you play as famous basketball stars in fast-paced 2v2 matches. Perform special moves, dunks, and compete in various game modes.

name: Basketball Stars
desc: Competitive 1v1 basketball with realistic mechanics
longDesc: Basketball Stars is a competitive basketball game featuring 1v1 matches, tournaments, and various game modes. Master dribbling, shooting, and defense to become a champion.

name: Battle Karts
desc: Kart racing with weapons and power-ups in multiplayer battles
longDesc: Battle Karts combines kart racing with arena combat. Race around tracks while using weapons and power-ups to attack opponents and secure first place.

name: Big Flappy Tower Tiny Square
desc: Flappy Bird meets precision platforming in a vertical tower
longDesc: Navigate through a challenging vertical tower using Flappy Bird-style controls. Time your flaps perfectly to avoid obstacles and climb to the top in this precision platformer.

name: Big Ice Tower Tiny Square
desc: Fast-paced precision platformer set in a frozen tower
longDesc: Big Ice Tower Tiny Square is a challenging platformer where you dash and jump through an icy tower. Master momentum and precise timing to overcome deadly obstacles.

name: Big Neon Tower Tiny Square
desc: Neon-styled precision platformer with gravity mechanics
longDesc: Navigate through a neon tower filled with gravity-defying challenges. Use precise controls and timing to overcome obstacles in this visually striking platformer.

name: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
desc: Sequel to the challenging precision platformer series
longDesc: Big Tower Tiny Square 2 expands on the original with new mechanics, longer levels, and even more challenging obstacles. Dash and jump your way to the top of the tower.

name: Block Blast 2
desc: Match and clear blocks in this addictive puzzle sequel
longDesc: Block Blast 2 is an improved version of the block-matching puzzle game. Place shapes on the grid to create and clear lines, with new mechanics and challenges.

name: Block Blast
desc: Tetris-inspired puzzle game with block placement mechanics
longDesc: Block Blast is a relaxing puzzle game where you place blocks on a grid to clear lines and score points. Plan your moves carefully to achieve high scores.

name: Blood Money
desc: Action shooter where you fight through waves for cash rewards
longDesc: Blood Money is an intense action game where you battle through enemy waves to earn money. Upgrade your weapons and abilities between rounds to survive increasingly difficult challenges.

name: Bloxorz
desc: Roll a block to the goal hole in this brain-teasing puzzle game
longDesc: Bloxorz is a challenging puzzle game where you roll a rectangular block through 3D levels, trying to get it to fall into the goal hole without falling off the edge.

name: Brawl Stars
desc: Fast-paced multiplayer battle arena by Supercell
longDesc: Brawl Stars is a multiplayer battle game where you compete in various game modes with unique characters called Brawlers. Team up and fight in 3v3 battles or solo showdowns.

name: Buckshot Roulette
desc: High-stakes horror game of Russian roulette with a shotgun
longDesc: Buckshot Roulette is a tabletop horror game where you play Russian roulette with a shotgun against a dealer. Use items strategically and manage risk in this tense psychological thriller.

name: Burrito Bison Launcha Libre
desc: Launch yourself through candy land in this upgrading launcher game
longDesc: Burrito Bison Launcha Libre is an action-packed launcher game where you bounce through levels, smashing gummy bears and collecting cash to upgrade your abilities.

name: Celeste 2
desc: Sequel to the challenging mountain-climbing platformer
longDesc: Celeste 2 continues the precision platforming action with new mechanics and challenges. Climb the mountain while mastering advanced movement techniques.

name: Celeste
desc: Critically acclaimed precision platformer about climbing a mountain
longDesc: Celeste is a challenging platformer about climbing Celeste Mountain. Master the dash mechanic and overcome difficult obstacles in this emotional journey about mental health and perseverance.

name: Cluster Rush
desc: Fast-paced parkour game where you jump across moving trucks
longDesc: Cluster Rush is a first-person parkour game where you run and jump across moving trucks on a highway. Time your jumps perfectly to avoid falling and reach the finish line.

name: Cookie Clicker
desc: Addictive idle game where you bake cookies to build an empire
longDesc: Cookie Clicker is the original idle game where you click to bake cookies and buy upgrades to automate production. Build a massive cookie empire with grandmas, farms, and time machines.

name: Core Ball
desc: Attach balls to the core without hitting other balls
longDesc: Core Ball is a precision timing game where you shoot balls to attach them to a rotating core. Avoid hitting other attached balls as the difficulty increases with each level.

name: Crazy Cars
desc: High-speed racing with stunts and nitro boosts
longDesc: Crazy Cars is an arcade racing game featuring high-speed tracks, stunts, and powerful vehicles. Use nitro boosts and perform tricks to win races.

name: Crazy Cattle 3D
desc: Herd cattle through challenging 3D obstacle courses
longDesc: Crazy Cattle 3D is a quirky game where you guide cattle through 3D environments filled with obstacles. Manage your herd and reach the goal without losing too many animals.

name: Crossy Road
desc: Endless hopper where you cross roads and rivers with traffic
longDesc: Crossy Road is an endless arcade hopper where you guide a chicken across busy roads, rivers, and train tracks. Unlock new characters and achieve high scores.

name: Deltarune
desc: RPG adventure from the creator of Undertale
longDesc: Deltarune is a role-playing game by Toby Fox featuring a unique battle system, memorable characters, and an engaging story. Explore a dark world with Kris and their friends.

name: Drift Boss
desc: Endless drifting game on a winding road
longDesc: Drift Boss is a one-button drifting game where you navigate an endless winding road. Time your drifts perfectly to stay on track and achieve the longest distance.

name: Drive Mad
desc: Physics-based driving game through challenging obstacle courses
longDesc: Drive Mad is a physics-based driving game where you navigate vehicles through increasingly difficult obstacle courses. Balance speed and control to reach the finish line.

name: Duck Life 2
desc: Train your duck to become a champion racer
longDesc: Duck Life 2 is a training simulation where you raise and train a duck through various mini-games. Improve your duck's stats and compete in races to become the champion.

name: Duck Life 3
desc: Evolution-themed duck training and racing game
longDesc: Duck Life 3 introduces evolution mechanics to the duck training series. Train your duck, evolve it into different forms, and compete in races across various environments.

name: Duck Life
desc: Original duck training simulator with mini-games
longDesc: Duck Life is the original game where you train a duckling through various mini-games to improve its running, swimming, flying, and energy. Compete in races to win trophies.

name: Eggy Car
desc: Drive carefully to avoid dropping the egg on bumpy terrain
longDesc: Eggy Car is a physics driving game where you transport a fragile egg across hilly terrain. Balance speed and caution to travel as far as possible without breaking the egg.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl
desc: Cooperative puzzle platformer with elemental mechanics
longDesc: Fireboy and Watergirl is a cooperative puzzle game where you control two characters with opposite elemental properties. Work together to solve puzzles and reach the exit.

name: Flappy Bird
desc: Navigate a bird through pipes in this notoriously difficult game
longDesc: Flappy Bird is the iconic endless game where you tap to make a bird fly through gaps in pipes. Simple controls but extremely challenging gameplay made this a viral sensation.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
desc: Survive five nights against animatronics with new mechanics
longDesc: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 is a horror game where you work night shift at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Use cameras, flashlights, and a Freddy mask to survive against possessed animatronics.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
desc: Horror attraction with ventilation and audio systems
longDesc: Five Nights at Freddy's 3 takes place in a horror attraction. Manage ventilation, audio, and camera systems to survive against Springtrap and phantom animatronics.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
desc: Survive the night shift at a haunted pizza restaurant
longDesc: Five Nights at Freddy's is a survival horror game where you monitor security cameras and manage power to survive against animatronics that come alive at night.

name: Five Nights at Winston's
desc: FNAF-inspired horror game with unique mechanics
longDesc: Five Nights at Winston's is a fan-made horror game inspired by Five Nights at Freddy's. Survive against animatronic characters with new mechanics and challenges.

name: Free Rider
desc: Draw your own tracks and ride them in this physics game
longDesc: Free Rider is a physics-based bike game where you can draw custom tracks and ride them. Create challenging courses or play community-made levels.

name: Funny Shooter 2
desc: Chaotic FPS with ragdoll physics and silly weapons
longDesc: Funny Shooter 2 is a humorous first-person shooter with exaggerated ragdoll physics, silly enemies, and creative weapons. Battle through waves in this lighthearted action game.

name: Geometry Dash 3D
desc: Rhythm-based platformer in three dimensions
longDesc: Geometry Dash 3D brings the rhythm-based platforming action into 3D space. Navigate through levels synchronized to music while avoiding obstacles.

name: Geometry Dash Lite
desc: Free version of the rhythm-based platforming classic
longDesc: Geometry Dash Lite is the free version of the popular rhythm game. Jump and fly through dangerous passages and obstacles in sync with the music.

name: Granny
desc: Escape from a creepy house while avoiding Granny
longDesc: Granny is a first-person horror game where you're trapped in a house and must escape within 5 days. Stay quiet and hide from Granny who hears everything.

name: Grow a Garden
desc: Relaxing gardening simulation game
longDesc: Grow a Garden is a peaceful simulation game where you plant seeds, water plants, and watch your garden bloom. Create a beautiful garden at your own pace.

name: GTA 2
desc: Classic top-down open-world crime game
longDesc: Grand Theft Auto 2 is the classic top-down action game set in a futuristic city. Complete missions, steal cars, and cause chaos in this retro open-world experience.

name: Happy Wheels
desc: Ragdoll physics game with violent obstacle courses
longDesc: Happy Wheels is a physics-based game featuring ragdoll characters navigating deadly obstacle courses. Choose different characters and vehicles in this notoriously brutal game.

name: Hextris
desc: Hexagonal Tetris with rotating gameplay
longDesc: Hextris is a puzzle game that combines Tetris with a hexagonal grid. Rotate the hexagon to match falling blocks and create lines in this addictive twist on classic gameplay.

desc: Reverse 2048 where you combine tiles from 2048 down to 1
longDesc: 1 is a unique puzzle game that reverses the 2048 concept. Start with 2048 tiles and combine them to create smaller numbers, working your way down to the number 1.

name: Learn to Fly 2
desc: Help a penguin achieve flight through upgrades and experiments
longDesc: Learn to Fly 2 is an upgrade game where you launch a penguin and use various gadgets to help it fly. Earn money to buy better equipment and reach greater distances.

name: Learn to Fly 3
desc: Latest penguin flight simulator with advanced mechanics
longDesc: Learn to Fly 3 continues the penguin's quest for flight with new mechanics, upgrades, and challenges. Build rockets, complete missions, and achieve new flight records.

name: Learn to Fly
desc: Original penguin launcher game with upgrades
longDesc: Learn to Fly is the original game where a penguin tries to prove penguins can fly. Launch from a ramp, glide through the air, and upgrade your equipment to fly farther.

name: Minecraft 1.5.2
desc: Classic version of Minecraft in your browser
longDesc: Minecraft 1.5.2 is a browser version of the classic sandbox game. Mine resources, craft items, build structures, and survive in this iconic creative game.

name: Minecraft Astra Client
desc: Enhanced Minecraft client with additional features
longDesc: Minecraft Astra Client is a modified version of Minecraft with enhanced features, optimizations, and quality-of-life improvements for browser play.

name: Minecraft Indev
desc: Very early development version of Minecraft
longDesc: Minecraft Indev is one of the earliest development versions of Minecraft. Experience the game in its primitive form with basic mechanics and limited features.

name: Minecraft Parkour
desc: Parkour challenge maps in Minecraft
longDesc: Minecraft Parkour features custom parkour maps where you jump across blocks and obstacles. Test your precision jumping skills in various challenging courses.

name: Minecraft Resent Client
desc: Popular Minecraft client for browser with mods
longDesc: Minecraft Resent Client is a feature-rich browser client for Minecraft with various mods, optimizations, and customization options.

name: Minecraft Tower Defence
desc: Tower defense game set in the Minecraft universe
longDesc: Minecraft Tower Defence combines tower defense mechanics with Minecraft aesthetics. Place defensive blocks and fight off waves of mobs trying to reach your base.

name: Minecraft Zeta Client
desc: Advanced Minecraft browser client
longDesc: Minecraft Zeta Client is an advanced browser version of Minecraft with enhanced features, performance improvements, and additional functionality.

name: Moto X3M 2
desc: Bike racing with stunts and explosive obstacles
longDesc: Moto X3M 2 is a motorcycle stunt racing game with challenging courses filled with ramps, explosions, and hazards. Perform flips and reach the finish line quickly.

name: Moto X3M 3
desc: Third installment with new levels and challenges
longDesc: Moto X3M 3 brings more extreme motorcycle racing with new levels, obstacles, and challenges. Master your bike and complete increasingly difficult courses.

name: Moto X3M Spooky Land
desc: Halloween-themed motorcycle stunt racing
longDesc: Moto X3M Spooky Land is a Halloween edition featuring spooky-themed levels with pumpkins, ghosts, and haunted obstacles. Race through creepy courses on your bike.

name: Moto X3M Winter
desc: Winter-themed bike racing through snowy courses
longDesc: Moto X3M Winter takes the stunt racing to snowy landscapes. Navigate through ice, snowmen, and winter obstacles while performing flips and tricks.

name: Moto X3M
desc: Original extreme motorcycle stunt racing game
longDesc: Moto X3M is the original motorcycle racing game with intense stunts and challenging obstacles. Race through levels, perform flips, and achieve the best times.

name: Plants vs Zombies
desc: Defend your lawn using plants against zombie invasion
longDesc: Plants vs Zombies is a classic tower defense game where you use various plants to defend against waves of zombies. Plant sunflowers, shooters, and defensive plants strategically.

name: Retro Bowl
desc: Retro-styled American football management game
longDesc: Retro Bowl is an American football game with retro graphics. Manage your team, call plays, and lead them to championship glory in this addictive sports game.

name: Short Life
desc: Ragdoll platformer with deadly traps and obstacles
longDesc: Short Life is a brutal platformer where you navigate through levels filled with deadly traps. Watch your character suffer hilarious deaths as you try to reach the exit.

name: Slither.io
desc: Multiplayer snake game where you grow by eating pellets
longDesc: Slither.io is a multiplayer game where you control a snake, eating glowing orbs to grow longer. Trap other players and consume their remains to become the biggest snake.

name: Slope 3
desc: High-speed ball rolling game with neon graphics
longDesc: Slope 3 is an endless running game where you control a ball rolling down a slope at increasing speeds. Avoid obstacles and stay on the platform as long as possible.

name: Slow Roads
desc: Relaxing endless driving game through procedural landscapes
longDesc: Slow Roads is a meditative driving game where you cruise through beautiful procedurally generated landscapes. No objectives, just peaceful driving and scenery.

name: Snow Rider 3D
desc: Endless snowboarding down procedural mountains
longDesc: Snow Rider 3D is an endless snowboarding game where you ride down snowy mountains, avoiding obstacles and collecting gifts. See how far you can go.

name: Soccer Random
desc: Chaotic soccer with random physics and conditions
longDesc: Soccer Random is a hilarious soccer game where physics and field conditions change randomly each match. Adapt to crazy scenarios and score more goals than your opponent.

name: Subway Surfers
desc: Endless runner where you surf trains and dodge obstacles
longDesc: Subway Surfers is an endless running game where you dash through subway tracks, dodging trains and obstacles while collecting coins and power-ups.

name: SUPERHOT
desc: Time moves only when you move in this innovative shooter
longDesc: SUPERHOT is a unique FPS where time only moves when you move. Plan your actions carefully and dodge bullets in slow motion in this mind-bending shooter.

name: The Binding of Isaac
desc: Roguelike dungeon crawler with dark themes
longDesc: The Binding of Isaac is a randomly generated dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Battle through floors filled with monsters, collect items, and face challenging bosses.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap
desc: Classic Zelda adventure with size-changing mechanics
longDesc: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap is a classic adventure where Link can shrink to tiny size. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and save Hyrule from evil.

name: The World's Hardest Game
desc: Notoriously difficult precision movement game
longDesc: The World's Hardest Game lives up to its name. Navigate a red square through mazes filled with blue circles. One touch means starting over in this brutally difficult game.

name: Tiny Fishing
desc: Relaxing fishing game where you catch and upgrade
longDesc: Tiny Fishing is a casual fishing game where you cast your line, catch fish, and upgrade your equipment. Relax and see what rare fish you can discover.

name: ULTRAKILL
desc: Fast-paced retro FPS with blood-fueled health system
longDesc: ULTRAKILL is a fast-paced retro FPS where you heal by dealing damage. Combine weapons creatively and style on enemies in this blood-fueled arena shooter.

name: Vex 2
desc: Stickman platformer with deadly obstacles
longDesc: Vex 2 is a challenging platformer where you control a stickman through levels filled with spikes, saws, and hazards. Master the controls to complete each act.

name: Vex 3
desc: Third entry in the challenging stickman series
longDesc: Vex 3 continues the challenging platforming with new obstacles and mechanics. Run, jump, slide, and swim through increasingly difficult levels.

name: Vex 6
desc: Latest stickman platformer with new challenges
longDesc: Vex 6 brings more intense platforming action with new mechanics, obstacles, and levels. Navigate through dangerous terrain as a stickman acrobat.

name: Vex 7
desc: Newest installment with fresh obstacles and mechanics
longDesc: Vex 7 is the newest entry featuring fresh obstacles, mechanics, and even more challenging platforming. Master new abilities and overcome deadly hazards.

name: Vex 8
desc: Most recent Vex game with cutting-edge challenges
longDesc: Vex 8 is the most recent installment with the most polished mechanics and challenging levels yet. Experience refined stickman platforming at its best.

name: Vex
desc: Original challenging stickman platformer
longDesc: Vex is the original stickman platformer that started the series. Navigate through deadly obstacles, spikes, and hazards in this precision-based game.

name: Volley Random
desc: Volleyball with random physics and silly mechanics
longDesc: Volley Random is a hilarious volleyball game where physics and player abilities change randomly. Adapt to bizarre conditions and score points in this chaotic sports game.

name: Word Wonders
desc: Word puzzle game with crossword mechanics
longDesc: Word Wonders is a word puzzle game where you form words from letters to fill crossword-style grids. Expand your vocabulary and solve increasingly challenging puzzles.

name: Wordle
desc: Daily word guessing game in six tries
longDesc: Wordle is the viral word puzzle game where you guess a five-letter word in six tries. Use the colored feedback to narrow down the correct word.

name: YoHoHo.io
desc: Multiplayer pirate battle royale on islands
longDesc: YoHoHo.io is a pirate-themed battle royale where you fight other pirates on islands. Collect coins, grow bigger, and become the last pirate standing.

name: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets
desc: Defend against waves of Skibidi Toilet enemies
longDesc: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets is a wave-based shooter where you fight off hordes of Skibidi Toilet enemies. Survive as long as possible against increasing numbers.

name: Zombocalypse 2
desc: Side-scrolling zombie survival with weapons and upgrades
longDesc: Zombocalypse 2 is a side-scrolling action game where you fight endless zombie hordes. Use various weapons, unlock upgrades, and survive as long as possible.
